name: Animagus
description:
Version 1.0

This was a project developed during the Game Bang 2021. 

The given theme is "Biodiversity" 

Use "ad" to control the player to move. 

If you experience any bug that cannot let you move on, you could press "1", "2", or "3" to switch from levels. 

Once you've catch a jack rabbit, you would gain the ability to jump. However, the number of jumps is limited. You could see how many jumps you're left with. BTW, you need to press "space" to jump

Once you've catch a Salamander, you would leave a Doppelganger at your current location when you've walked for enough distance. The distance left will be shown on the top right corner. Although the current version doesn't include any puzzle with Salamander yet.

There's other animals that you may catch to gain special ability. Still developing....

Known bugs: 

  • There is a tile error that causing the platform cannot be seen in the fist level
  • The number of jumps isn't keeping correctly by the counter
  • Sometimes itch cannot load the game successfully. If this happens, you could download the game to your PC to solve this issue for now.
